fields.name: Trust in others (Eurostat (2015))
fields.description: Variable of a general nature and refers to the respondent's opinion/feeling. Trust in others does not refer to a specific group of people. On the scale of 0 (You do no trust any other person) to 10 (Most people can be trusted).

fields.name: Trust in police (Eurostat (2015))
fields.description: Trust in institutions (the police), 0 corresponds to 'No trust at all' and 10 'Complete trust' in the concerned institution. The term police refers to the police as an institution.
